description:
Top Nursing Home Abuse And Personal Injury Lawyers

If you have a loved one living in a nursing home or assisted living facility and you suspect he or she is the victim of neglect or abuse, you deserve an advocate on your side to help you hold the responsible parties accountable in order to obtain the justice you deserve.

Dedicated To Your Needs

At Senior Justice Law Firm, we devote our practice to fighting on behalf of those who experience suffering at the hands of negligent and careless nursing home staff and caretakers, and our law firm is one of only a few in the state devoted to this area of law.

With 11 office locations throughout the United States, our law firm offers convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and support possible to those in need. Along with nursing home abuse and neglect, our attorneys also handle all types of medical malpractice, personal injury and wrongful death claims, and we have more than 50 years of combined experience helping our clients recover more than $100 million to date.

Compassionate Counsel, Aggressive Advocacy

We understand the stress and anxiety you are likely experiencing regarding your situation, and we promise to treat you and your loved ones with the compassion and respect you deserve. You should not face your struggles alone. You can trust the attorneys at Senior Justice Law Firm for the help you need. To discuss your situation free of charge, you can contact our law office to schedule a consultation.
